```{r}
true_mu_alpha_0 <- true_mu_alpha/10
est_mu_alpha_0 <- est_mu_alpha/10

plot(est_mu_alpha_0, est_mu_rho)
plot(est_mu_rho, est_mu_alpha_0)

plot(est_mu_rho, est_mu_alpha, col = "black", xlim = c(0,1), ylim = c(0,10))
abline(a = 0, b = 10, col = "red", lwd = 1)
#points(true_mu_alpha, true_mu_rho, col = "black", xlim = c(0,10), ylim = c(0,1))
plot(true_mu_rho, true_mu_alpha, col = "black", xlim = c(0,1), ylim = c(0,10))
abline(a = 0, b = 10, col = "red", lwd = 1)

plot((true_mu_alpha-est_mu_alpha), (true_mu_rho-est_mu_rho),col = "black")
```
